ComicInfo.Title: Rock & Roll Aliens; The Bobfellows!; Stranger in a Strange Land; On Tour with the Captain; F.T.W.; Take It All Off!; Bill's Band; The Green Stuff; The Good 'Ole Dreadful Dud Go Punk!; Perchance ta Canasta; merf 'n eedle; Cold War; Just Another Gig; Pied Piper of Hamel(i)n

ComicInfo.Summary:
Bernie's new Dylan bootleg has arrived in the mail and he wants to share it.
A woman pulls a knife on Mary as she's getting ready for a gig.
